contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Willemstad.jpg|thumb|right|[[Willemstad (North Brabant)|Willemstad]] and the Hollands Diep.]] '''Hollands Diep''' is a wide river in the [[Netherlands]]<ref>http://www.rijkswaterstaat.nl/water/feiten_en_cijfers/vaarwegenoverzicht/hollandsch_diep/index.aspx</ref> and an [[estuary]] of the [[Rhine]] and [[Meuse river]]. Through the [[Scheldt-Rhine Canal]] it connects to the [[Scheldt]] river and [[Antwerp]]. The [[Bergse Maas river]] and the [[Nieuwe Merwede river]] join near [[Drimmelen|Lage Zwaluwe]] to form the Hollands Diep. The [[Dordtsche Kil]] connects to it at near [[Moerdijk]]. Near [[Cromstrijen|Numansdorp]] it splits into the [[Haringvliet]] and the [[Volkerak]]. At this point there is the Hellegatsplein in the water, a [[road]] traffic node, connecting to the [[Hoeksche Waard]] island on the north by the Haringvliet bridge, to the [[Goeree-Overflakkee]] on the west by the Hellegatsdam, and to the mainland on the southeast by the Volkerak Sluices. On the east side of the Hollands Diep the Moerdijk bridges connect the [[Dordrecht]] island on the north to the mainland on the south: a [[road]] [[bridge]], a [[railroad]] bridge; a second railroad bridge has recently been constructed for the [[HSL-Zuid]]. ==References== {{reflist}} {{coord|51|42|00|N|4|35|02|E|display=title|region:NL_type:waterbody_source:nlwiki}} {{Rhine–Meuse–Scheldt delta}} [[Category:Rhine–Meuse–Scheldt delta]] [[Category:Estuaries]] [[Category:Ramsar sites in the Netherlands]]
